meanings.sent1: She routinized her morning exercise by doing the same yoga routine every day.
meanings.sent2: After a few weeks, he routinized his study schedule to include breaks every hour.
meanings.sent3: The robot routinized its tasks so efficiently that it finished all its work in record time.
meanings.sent4: The factory routinized its production process, turning out products like clockwork.
meanings.sent5: Her daily routine was so routinized that she could do it in her sleep.

meanings.definition: To establish or adopt a routine.
meanings.sent1: They routinized their bedtime routine by reading a story every night.
meanings.sent2: The team routinized their meeting schedule to ensure everyone was on the same page.
meanings.sent3: The cat routinized its mealtime by meowing loudly at the same time every day.
meanings.sent4: The school routinized its morning assembly, with the same songs and announcements each day.
meanings.sent5: He routinized his daily commute, taking the same route to work every morning.
